name: Game Dev Idle
description:
Playful and lighthearted idle game where you play as a game developer trying to manage it's own studio. Have fun ! :)

At first, you must do all tasks by yourself, by choosing one of the 4 specializations on the left side menu (Progamming, Art, Sound and Game Design). When you have enough money, be sure to hire some people to help you gain more money, even when offline !

Little prototype made while exploring the Idle genre. 

IAPs and Ads are disabled in this WebGL build.
